abilities.name: Powerslide
abilities.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

abilities.name: Face Melt
abilities.description: Deals 68 damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Guitar Solo
abilities.description: Regenerate 66 Health per second for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Mosh Pit
heroics.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

heroics.name: Stage Dive
heroics.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

original.name: E.T.C.
original.title: Rock God
original.description: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.
original.shortDescription: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.

baseHeroInfo.name: E.T.C.
baseHeroInfo.title: Rock God
baseHeroInfo.description: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Tank who supplies his team with a good bit of utility.

trait.name: Rockstar
trait.description: After E.T.C. uses a Basic or Heroic ability, he gains 20 Armor for 2 seconds. This effect does not stack with itself.

skins.name: Rock God
skins.description: The Power of the Horde incarnated by brutal rhythms and blistering guitar riffs into the most elite tauren chieftain to ever headbang across the surface of Azeroth. Don't bother putting on socks. He's just going to rock them off anyways.

skins.name: Black Metal E.T.C.
skins.description: Some bands paint their faces and play death metal. E.T.C. however, IS death metal.

skins.name: Pure Country E.T.C.
skins.description: After E.T.C's pickup truck broke down and his dog died there was really only one thing left for him to do-- go country! Time to bring a whole new meaning to cowboy.

skins.name: Glam Metal E.T.C.
skins.description: The Elite Tauren Chieftan has been rocking the world for a long time, man. He's seen fashions come and fashions go, but neon pants and feathered hair? Those are forever.
